sentence.Network_en: Life is not composed by aphorism, how can we decorate it with pompous cliche & 1 & s? I send you my most sincere greeting in silence.
sentence.Network_cn: 人生并非格言组成,岂能靠美丽的 辞章 来妆点, 默默中,有我对你最诚挚的祝福.

sentence.Network_en: It is the aphorism of the Asian Games.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French aphorisme or late Latin aphorismus, from Greek aphorismos 'definition', from aphorizein 'define'

encyclopedia.content: 简介 日文名：アホリズ 英文名：aphorism 中文名：杀戮箴言 漫画作者：宫条カルナ 漫画类型：魔幻校园 故事梗概 讲述了唯有能看见空中岛屿的学生才能入学，全员住宿制的男女合校“楢鹿高级中学”。只要能顺利毕业，前途将一片光明。然而，怀抱梦想与希望的学生们将面对的却是“神蚀”！这是个现实被一点一滴残酷吞蚀的绝望考验…只有挺身迎战、绝不妥协的人才能存活的神之试练！ 人物介绍 六道黄叶 本作品的主人公。 身高：1.60

entry.def: An aphorism is a short witty sentence which expresses a general truth or comment.

example.ex: 'What if they gave a war and nobody came?' was one of his generation's favored aphorisms.
example.tran: “如果他们宣战却无人应战该怎么办？”是他那一代人钟爱的格言。

auth_sentence.content: Be rigorously honest and don't "fake it till you make it", if that aphorism bothers you.

stems_affixes.word_buile: a+phor带来+ism行为,现象→带来[思想,智慧]
dys坏+phor带来+ia病→带来不好状态→焦虑
eu好+phor带来+ia状态→带来美好→愉快
